meta.title: Inventing — Custom SaaS on Subscription
meta.description: Custom SaaS solutions on a fixed monthly subscription (no upfront cost) for logistics and manufacturing leaders. Replace spreadsheet chaos with secure, scalable software tailored to your workflow.

hero.headline: Stop Managing Your Multi‑Million Logistics & Manufacturing Business in Excel.
hero.subheadline: We build the custom software you need to eliminate technical debt and admin chaos. Zero Upfront Cost. Fixed Monthly Subscription.
hero.visualTitle: From spreadsheet chaos → clean ops dashboard
hero.microProof: Built for operations leaders who need reliability, not another tool to babysit.

excelHell.heading: Excel is a masterpiece. It’s a dangerous place to run a warehouse.
excelHell.copy: Excel is a masterpiece of software, but it’s a dangerous place to run a warehouse. When your “human‑database” quits or a formula breaks, your revenue stops. We turn your “Excel Hell” into a secure, scalable SaaS tailored to your specific workflow.

partnership.heading: We take the build risk. You keep the upside.
partnership.description: Three steps from spreadsheet dependency to a dedicated SaaS module—then a fixed monthly subscription once it’s live (hosting, security, updates included).

extraction.title: 1) The Extraction
extraction.body: We sit with your team to map the messy manual processes behind the spreadsheet.

engineering.title: 2) The Engineering
engineering.body: We build your dedicated SaaS module. We take the development risk; you pay 0 SEK for the build.

optimization.title: 3) The Optimization
optimization.body: Once live, you pay a fixed monthly subscription. We handle hosting, security, and updates. You focus on growth.

whyInventing.heading: Swedish standards. Polish execution. Built for factories & fleets.
whyInventing.description: We build custom SaaS for logistics and manufacturing: fast to ship, hard to break, and designed around the reality of operations.

swedish.title: Swedish engineering standards
swedish.body: Predictable delivery, pragmatic decisions, and systems that don’t break at 2 AM.

aiSpeed.title: High‑speed AI‑assisted development
aiSpeed.body: Shorter cycles without cutting corners—so you can automate next month, not next year.

b2b.title: B2B operations specialization
b2b.body: We don’t make “websites.” We make tools that calculate fuel margins, track ESG metrics, and automate warehouse floor‑plans.

trust.heading: Swedish Pragmatism. Polish Ambition. Global Scale.
trust.description: If your operation depends on spreadsheets, we’ll replace them with a secure, scalable SaaS that matches your workflow—and reduces admin chaos.
trust.badgeLine: Subscription • No upfront cost • Dedicated SaaS
trust.micro: 15–30 min. No prep. Bring the spreadsheet.

diagnostic.heading: How expensive is your spreadsheet dependency?
diagnostic.description: Answer 3 questions. We’ll turn it into a scoped problem statement for your discovery call.
diagnostic.cardDescription: No email required. Use it to brief us faster.

q1.label: How many hours a week do you spend copy‑pasting data between files?

q2.label: How many people’s jobs depend on a single spreadsheet?

q3.label: What would it be worth to have this automated by next month?

diagnostic.sideTitle: What happens after you click send?
diagnostic.sideDescription: We respond with a plan you can sanity‑check.
diagnostic.sideBullet1: We clarify the workflow and data sources (ERP, WMS, TMS, suppliers).
diagnostic.sideBullet2: We outline a first module that removes the biggest bottleneck.
diagnostic.sideBullet3: You get a fixed subscription proposal—no surprise invoices.

contact.heading: Book Your Problem Discovery
contact.description: Tell us what’s breaking. We’ll map the workflow and propose a subscription module.
